title: ID this font from Node Design brochure?
content:
Hello,

Does anyone know the typeface used for the copy on the left in this brochure?

Thanks very much in advance!

HB

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [01\_DSC\_0006-2\_972.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106100947/http:/typophile.com/files/01_DSC_0006-2_972.jpeg) | 249.32 KB |
author: henryb4762

comments.content: Thought it could have been [Graphik](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106100947/http:/commercialtype.com/typefaces/graphik) until I've seen [the digits](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106100947/http:/nodeberlin.com/archive/fall-out). If they come from from the same typeface, that could not be Graphik. They're closer to some [Bitstream version of Futura](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106100947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/) (to get this kind of cut on [1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106100947/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/futura/bold/glyphs.html#glyphs/243667/20)).
